title: The.Devil's.Needle.1916.1080p.Bluray.DTS.x264-GCJM
description:
The.Devil's.Needle.1916.1080p.Bluray.DTS.x264-GCJM

=======

Artist David White's model, Rene, is a drug addict. David falls for Wynne
Mortimer, the daughter of a wealthy man, but Wynne is engaged to Hugh
Gordon, her father's priggish right-hand man. To ease White's hurt, Rene
offers him some of her drugs. At first he refuses, but he sneaks a taste
and soon becomes hooked.
